title: Facebook earnings top $9 billion, but Apple change puts sales in the hot seat
text:
So what exactly is a billionaires' tax — and how would it work?

And would it be hard to implement? Experts weigh in. See full story.

Cathie Wood says Jack Dorsey's ‘hyperinflation' call is off the mark

Twitter founder Jack Dorsey's warning that “hyperinflation” is around the corner gets some pushback, including a detailed rebuttal from highflying tech investor Cathie Wood. See full story.

Harvard's endowment return is worse than the S&P 500 and that should be a lesson for your own portfolio

Choose a comfortable risk level and stick with it. See full story.

California's ‘atmospheric rivers' and ‘bomb cyclone' bring scant long-term rain relief — a look at the Western drought by the numbers

Moderate to heavy rain fell across Northern California heading into a weekend that's expected bring stormy weather to the drought-ravaged state, which is among the hardest hit as the U.S. West continues to strain under dry conditions. See full story.
